auth.badUsername: No user found with this username
auth.usernameTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose another one.
auth.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
auth.usernameTooLong: Username must be at most 20 characters long.
auth.emailInUse: This email is already in use in an active account.
auth.challengeExpired: The challenge has expired. Please try again.
auth.noPasskey: No passkey registered for this user.
auth.passkeyLoginFailed: Passkey login failed. Please try again.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth.passwordTooLong: Password must be at most 100 characters long.
auth.useOauth: Please use {{provider}} to log in to this account.

totp.registerFailed: Failed to register TOTP. Please try again.
totp.notEnabled: You must enable TOTP to perform this action.
totp.needTOTP: You need to provide a TOTP code to perform this action.

passwordReset.noAccountWithEmail: No account associated with this e-mail!

server.connectionRefused: Connection refused. Please try again later.

successes.setUpTOTP: TOTP has been set up successfully.
successes.resetPasswordRequest: Go check your inbox to reset your password!
successes.resetPassword: Your password has been reset successfully!

logIn.title: Log in with TOTP
logIn.description: Enter your TOTP code to log in.

enable.description: 2FA is not enabled for your account.

manage.title: Manage TOTP
manage.description: You can manage your TOTP settings here.

secondStep.description: Confirm your identity by entering your TOTP code.

setup.title: Set up TOTP
setup.description: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app to set up TOTP.
setup.unableToScan: Unable to scan? You can show the secret key :

success.title: TOTP Setup Successful
success.description: You have successfully set up TOTP for your account.
success.message: Your account is now protected with a second layer of security thanks to TOTP.

oauth.title: Account settings locked
oauth.description: You cannot change most of your settings because your account is bound to {{provider}} OAuth provider.

password.title: Password
password.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.

TOTP.title: TOTP
TOTP.description: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a second form of verification when logging in.

passkey.title: Passkey
passkey.description: A passkey is a secure way to log in to your account without a password. It uses cryptographic keys stored on your device.

modal.title: Remove Passkey
modal.description: Are you sure you want to remove this passkey? This action cannot be undone.

create.title: Create Flag
create.description: Create a new flag to manage feature rollouts and experiments.

input.exampleDescription: E.g., 'Enable new dashboard for selected users'

delete.title: Delete Flag
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this flag? This action cannot be undone.

edit.title: Edit Flag
edit.description: Edit the details of the feature flag.

input.exampleDescription: E.g., 'Enable new dashboard for selected users'

cookies.title: Did someone say cookies !
cookies.descriptionWithCookies: Just to inform you that we do use non essential cookies.
cookies.descriptionWithoutCookies: Just to inform you that we DO NOT USE any unessential cookies.

token.name: Authentication Token
token.purpose: Used to keep you logged in and secure your account.

locale.name: Language Preference
locale.purpose: Stores your language preference for a better experience.

flag_id.name: Feature Flag Identifier
flag_id.purpose: Helps us manage experimental features for your account.
